Summary: Blue/gray oblong disc 1/4 size of full moon was seen while driving outside Lancaster
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around June 19th 2009
divs: sighting details this report was relayed to me(f.i.connie mcnichols)by pete hartinger (rufos)this is taken from phone interview i had with the witness on 06\21\09. on 06\19\09 between midnight and 1:00am while driving south on rt 33 from columbus outside of lancaster when the witness noticed in the south a blue\gray illuminated light.shaped like a oblong disc hovering 50 degrees above horizon, at unknown distance.the object was 1\4 the size of the full moon.as she approached it suddely flashed like a huge camera flash,turned right (west) and flew out of sight within seconds. total duration approximately 10 seconds.
